tasks.label: Build for Pico (Release)
tasks.command: rm -rf build && cmake -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DPICO_BOARD=pico && cmake --build build -- -j && mkdir -p deploy && cp build/altair.uf2 deploy/altair_pico.uf2

tasks.label: Build All Boards (Release)
